profile:
Installing and Servicing Residential and Commercial Irrigation Since 1980.

We are proud to maintain over 1000 residential and commercial systems throughout Durham Region and the GTA. 

Installing new irrigation and garden lighting for homes, businesses, cottages, parks, sports fields for over almost 40 years has made us a trusted name in the industry.   We are Certified Irrigation Contractors, Certified Irrigation Technicians, Certified Landscape Technicians

We also install drainage solutions, outdoor sound systems, artificial turf
We offer lawn restoration services such as new turf/ sod, aeration & seeding
